issue.title: www.atv.com.tr
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.atv.com.tr/canli-yayin](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.atv.com.tr%2Fcanli-yayin) ### Comment > This issue is caused by the "Hide IP Address" option in Privacy mode. > > Add this rule to your AdGuard Turkish filter. > `@@||securevideotoken.tmgrup.com.tr/webtv/secure^$stealth=ip` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/hl3knf8d7dsgwossg4oks8w8gwwc4wsivexc6kisxs.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/qpb8xhxciio40ok4ks8wsggog0ok84khiyjamd3c1k.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.20.3 (4994) System version: | Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.26100.0 Browser: | Firefox License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Disable cache for third-party requests,
Block third-party Authorization header

**Browser API**:
Block WebRTC,
Block Push API,
Block Location API,
Block Flash

**Windows tracking**:
Disable Windows Telemetry,
Turn off Advertising ID,
Disable Windows Defender automatic samples submission,
Disable WAP Push Message Routing Service

**Miscellaneous**:
Hide your Referrer from third-parties (startpage.com),
Hide your User-Agent,
Hide your IP address (78.183.25.12),
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
AdGuard URL Tracking,
